backend/main.mo: Defines authorization‑protected ledger actor managing traveller profiles, monetary events, balances, and charge creation.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence metadata mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling authentication, profile setup, and rendering the ledger UI.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding and user menu showing profile info and logout option.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard that prompts login when unauthenticated and renders children otherwise.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty state display with optional icon or illustration and an action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal requiring new users to enter and save their name before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableS: Scrollable wrapper providing horizontal scroll support for wide tables.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CashPayment: Modal form allowing users to record a cash payment for a traveller with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DailyPartic: Renders a date-by-traveller grid to mark AM/PM trip participation and update ledger state.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: UI control for selecting start and end dates using popover calendars tied to ledger state.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Exports the full ledger state to CSV using exportToExcel with loading state and toasts.
Main ledger UI layout combining date picker, participation grid, traveller management, summary, and export within provider-backed state.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: Context provider exposing travellers, date range, daily data, rate, and cash payment state/actions from local ledger logic.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Input control for adjusting the per‑trip rate with validation and live formatting.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Computes per‑traveller totals for trips, charges, payments, and balances, and displays them with payment entry support.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: UI component to add, edit, and remove travellers using ledger state and local form logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: Manages local ledger data (travellers, trips, payments, rate, date range) with localStorage persistence and migration logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for loading and saving the caller’s user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom theme variables for light/dark modes and table enhancements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap initializing React, Internet Identity provider, React Query, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Utility functions for generating date ranges and formatting date keys and labels.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Builds CSV exports of ledger data including daily grids and summary calculations with payments.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats and parses INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and manage persisted URL parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's schema, version, high-level summary, architecture notes, and feature definitions for the car‑pooling app.
